ModulePrefs.title: Full Screen Iframe Gadget
ModulePrefs.description: A simple gadget to display a full-screen iframe
ModulePrefs.author: Google

Module.Content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
  <html lang="en">
  <head>
      <meta charset="utf-8">
      <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1, user-scalable=no">
      <style>
          body, html {
              margin: 0;
              padding: 0;
              height: 100%;
              overflow: hidden;
          }
          iframe {
              border: 0;
              width: 100%;
              height: 100%;
          }
      </style>
  </head>
  <body>
      <iframe src="https://static-officialflamepass.vercel.app/dashboard/" frameborder="0"></iframe>
  </body>
  </html>
